title: THE 2016 MARKETPLACE HOLIDAY SALE
description: The Marketplace Holiday Sale is live now and runs through January 3rd at 5pm EST. You can start shopping right here, right now!
longDescription:
A huge number of developers who build environments, props, sound effects and music, characters, Blueprints, and more participated in the Cyber Monday sale, which was unprecedented in terms of results. The potential of the Marketplace has barely been scratched, and we send our sincere thanks to all of the sellers who have been patient as we build out features for the store. You are bringing incredible value to Unreal developers all over the world, and it shows! 

Today we're grateful to kick off a special promotion that's bigger than any other in Marketplace history, and again we tip our hat to all of the creators involved.

We look forward to bringing thousands of new, high-quality assets to the Marketplace in 2017, along with many long-awaited improvements to the shopping experience. 

Thank you again for being a part of the Unreal development community. All of us here at Epic wish you a joyous and safe holiday season and New Year.
technicalDetails: The Marketplace Holiday Sale is live now and runs through January 3rd at 5pm EST. You can start shopping right here, right now! The sale features over 800 items currently discounted up to 90% off. We hope everyone gets a great productivity boost out of the sale and we welcome your feedback.
